products.title: Oslo Blackout Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo blackout solar yellow roller blind in yellow. Made to measure from 7.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This bright sunny yellow roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This yellow roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out their industry-leading sizesure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse their swifttrack blinds, for delivery next day!

products.title: Konya Blackout Primrose Yellow
products.metadescription: Made to measure konya blackout primrose yellow roller blind | privacy, thermal fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya blackout primrose yellow plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palermo (blackout), yellow - roller blind the soft sunshine of the palermo (blackout) yellow will add a cheery freshness to a window, even when it's doing its job of blocking out the outside light. Add to that the superior quality of the sleek blackout fa
products.productdescription: The soft sunshine of the palermo (blackout) yellow will add a cheery freshness to a window, even when it's doing its job of blocking out the outside light. Add to that the superior quality of the sleek blackout fabric and you have the perfect window covering! Use this blind in a modern country kitchen for both function and style; paired with other pastels and pretty florals, your window covering will give the room a summery, airy feel. Match the dining area to the kitchen for a co-ordinated look that will catch the eye as you walk in.

The gentle tones and soft drawn art style will bring a touch of pared back femininity to a space. This delightful design will team well with warm greys, yellows, silver and mustard tones.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Palermo (blackout), yellow - vertical blind the soft, pastel hue of the palermo (blackout) yellow will bring colour and sunshine wherever it goes. When the sun is out, and the blind is open, they will serve only to accent each other, creating a gorgeous g
products.productdescription: The soft, pastel hue of the palermo (blackout) yellow will bring colour and sunshine wherever it goes. When the sun is out, and the blind is open, they will serve only to accent each other, creating a gorgeous glow in your home. The yellow will work best with other pastels, or with whites, and can be used to add a subtle infusion of warm colour to an otherwise neutral room. Choose it for your home office or entry hallway for a distinctly pretty flush of colour.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Palermo (blackout), yellow - loft blind made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bath
products.productdescription: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor.Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Bright Yellow (4570) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bright yellow (4570) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.
